overview: A couple who moved into a certain property. It was a repeated psychic phenomenon that destroyed the happiness that seemed to have been obtained! A family that collapsed in the end of his wife committing suicide and her husband's disappearance. In order to find out the background, a spiritual document work that approaches the truth with a reproduction drama based on the remaining video and the testimony of the people concerned!
tagline: It started with one psychic phenomenon...!
title: Spiritual Disability Property
